website_summaries.verdict: One of the most affordable prepaid smartphones that doesn’t sacrifice speed and capability. This will give you everything you need for basic calling, texting, and browsing.
pros: Comes with a fast 4G LTE data connection for quick internet access
Long battery life of up to 22 hours of talk time and 14 days on standby
cons: Low resolution front and rear cameras won’t match the quality of higher-end smartphones

customer_reviews.title: Set up was easy. Google downloaded and installed all the apps that ...
customer_reviews.text: Set up was easy. Google downloaded and installed all the apps that were on my old Android phone. KitKat is much faster than Jellybean. SD card installation was super easy. The camera with the flash is a nice touch. Google also installed a couple of my contacts from my old phone. I did have to add several manually. Overall, for the money this is a excellent phone.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice phone. No would ever guess it is a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice phone. No would ever guess it is a Tracfone. I am not a "Techie Person". So it makes calls, I answer calls and check my emails. What can I say, does what I need it to do and then much more.
customer_reviews.author: ms. mimi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and operate (I also have a ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and operate (I also have a Samsung tablet). Easy to hold. My first smartphone so no others to compare with. Good reception. Easier to type on compared to my tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great phone.. easy to operate... just does not do well in water... 😖
customer_reviews.author: Laura...

customer_reviews.title: Tracfone Review
customer_reviews.text: So far I really love this phone, though it's only been a few weeks so hard to say as far as reliability outside my immediate area. Easy to use and the camera actually takes really nice pictures. Subtracting a star---I've had for less than 3 months and the SIM card (according to tracfone) has stopped working. And it will take 5-7 business days to get me a new one----I asked for one to be expedited but apparently they are "not allowed to do that"---frustrated with tracfone and it's customer service!
customer_reviews.author: abby

customer_reviews.title: 3 times I called tracfone to see why my phone ...
customer_reviews.text: 3 times I called tracfone to see why my phone says "you are roaming" even with 3-4 or 5 bars and wont' call. we have Verizon and my moto-e at least worked part of the time and never said I was roaming. It was 3g And this one is 4g lte tried to get help from Samsung too. no help

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Core Prime
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on sale from Tracfones website, it was less than $30.00 & for the cost it was a great little phone. I used it for over a year & just needed to upgrade to a larger screen. I still use it for browsing the web & taking pictures. I would purchase again.

product_meta.title: TracFone TFSAS820CP No Contract Phone - Retail Packaging (CDMA)
product_meta.description: Yes, the name sounds like it's straight out of a sci-fi movie. As it turns out, the phone itself might be, too. Featuring a simple and elegant design and a powerful 1.2 Ghz quadcore processor, the Galaxy Core Prime allows you to multitask quickly and efficiently, whether you're surfing the internet, navigating your way through town or browsing the Google Play store. With a brilliant 480x800 resolution touchscreen, front and rear camera and up to 12 hours of battery life, the Galaxy Core Prime is a modern-day prepaid smartphone that feels like it belongs in the next generation.
